subject: Basketball
Interscholastic Athletics
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Despite Indiana’s having 12 of the nation’s 13 largest high school gyms, the demise of a signature basketball site illustrates the passing of the high school sport’s heyday in the Hoosier state.
snippet: Despite Indiana’s having 12 of the nation’s 13 largest high school gyms, the demise of a signature basketball site illustrates the passing of the high school sport’s heyday in the Hoosier state.
